title: Lost In Translation
lyrics:
[Intro]
Hmm, hmm, hmm, hmm
[Verse 1]
Missed my flight
Long gone, where is home?
No one knows
Excuse this life
I’ve chose full of cheap shots
The low blows
[Pre-Chorus]
I never say, how I feel
(No, no, no)
No I never lie
No I never lie
But I rarely tell
Tell the truth
(No, no, no)
And you ask me why
And you ask me why
[Chorus]
If I keep it real?
(Feel like I'm lost in translation)
Honey will you feel me now?
Can I keep it real?
(Feel like I’m lost in translation)
Tell me do you feel me now? (Me now)
Feel like I'm lost in translation
Tell me do you feel me now
Feel like I'm lost in translation
Can you feel me now?

[Verse 2]
London is far from here
My boy
No, he ain't near
Time flies, passin' by
Another day, alone tonight
[Pre-Chorus]
I never say, how I feel
(No, no, no)
No I never lie
No I never lie
But I rarely tell
Tell the truth
(No, no, no)
And you ask me why
And you ask me why
[Chorus]
If I keep it real?
(Feel like I'm lost in translation)
Honey will you feel me now?
Can I keep it real?
(Feel like I’m lost in translation)
Tell me do you feel me now? (Me now)
Till' I got lost in translation
Tell me do you feel me now?
Feel like I'm lost in translation
Can you feel me now? (Me now, me now, me now, me now)
